txt.en: 'Captured green fireflies in the Midgewater Marshes ([placeholder]/[placeholder])'
Lightning in a Bottle
Capture red fireflies in Rushock Bog ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Capture yellow fireflies in the Grimwater ([placeholder]/[placeholder])

You can find sapphire fireflies in Dol Ringwest, emerald in the Midgewater Marshes, ruby in Rushock Bog, and amethyst in the Grimwater from gloaming till dawn.\n\nYou should collect fireflies for the wedding planner in Minas Tirith.
'Captured red fireflies in Rushock Bog ([placeholder]/[placeholder])'
Aid Merilien in gathering fireflies for Midsummer in Minas Tirith
'Captured yellow fireflies in the Grimwater ([placeholder]/[placeholder])'

'Hmm, you did better than I expected. These lanterns give off just the glow I was looking for!\n\n'More and more ceremonies are being planned every day. Come back tomorrow, I might have need of you again.'
Captured blue fireflies in Nen Hilith ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
'Hmm, you did better than I expected.'
The wedding planner Merilien is located in Minas Tirith.\n\nYou should return to Merilien in Minas Tirith.
'Capture yellow fireflies in the Grimwater ([placeholder]/[placeholder])'
Talk to Merilien
Capture blue fireflies in Nen Hilith ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Capture green fireflies in the Midgewater Marshes ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
'Capture blue fireflies in Nen Hilith ([placeholder]/[placeholder])'
The wedding planner in Minas Tirith seeks special lighting for her events.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: This quest will be removed from your quest log when the current festival ends.</rgb>
'Capture green fireflies in the Midgewater Marshes ([placeholder]/[placeholder])'
'Capture red fireflies in Rushock Bog ([placeholder]/[placeholder])'
Captured green fireflies in the Midgewater Marshes ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Captured red fireflies in Rushock Bog ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Captured yellow fireflies in the Grimwater ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
'Captured blue fireflies in Nen Hilith ([placeholder]/[placeholder])'

'Proper illumination is one of the most important elements for the perfect evening wedding. The soft flickering of the firefly is the perfect blend of soft radiance and playful wonder.

'Now, they can't be your run-of-the mill insects. I require colour-themed lanterns, so you'll have to do a bit of travelling for the perfect glow. There are a few bodies of water around which these special creatures live, emerging only as the sun dips down below the horizon.

'Fill these lanterns and return them to me straight away. And do try not to track bog water back here.'
